segments.text: Mike ! Good to hear from you . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everything is fine , and how are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Things are going well with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Kara , I had fun the other night at the movies and was wondering if you would like to go out again this Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mike , I don't think that it's a good idea to go out again . I really need to focus on getting packed and ready to move back home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe we could just meet for coffee or something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't really deal with any distractions right now , but I appreciate the nice evening we spent together .
segments.speaker: S2
